name: Centur-Ion Cimelia
desc: When your opponent activates a monster effect as Chain Link 2 or higher (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; the activated effect becomes "Your opponent places 1 "Centur-Ion" monster from their face-up field or GY in their Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap", also you cannot Special Summon "Centur-Ion Cimelia" for the rest of this turn. During the Main Phase, if this card is a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Centur-Ion Cimelia" once per turn.
